content:
Pick 2 Special offers when you book 10 or more peak room nights

  • 60% off our refreshed event spaces
  • Complimentary welcome reception for up to 25 guests in our redesigned bar
  • Complimentary meeting amenities including: Wi-Fi, new 75" flat panel TV for projection, and flip chart
  • Two suite upgrades in our new studio suites

Book by December 1st, 2018 and actualize by December 31st, 2018.

Valid on new bookings only and cannot be combined with any other promotion. Blackout dates apply.

Get all 4 perks if you book any of our HOT DATES (11/15-11/30, 12/13-12/30)
